name: testAddColumnList
description: Verification the possibility of adding column list on ListViewConfigPage
descriptionHtml: Verification the possibility of adding column list on ListViewConfigPage

testStage.description: Verification the possibility of adding column list on ListViewConfigPage

steps.name: Click on 'New Item' in the side menu
Click 'Save' button on the BaseConfigPage page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
Click to create a new View
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
Click the 'Edit View' button on the Side menu
